item.title:
The Associated Press reports that Christopher Nolan’s ‘OPPENHEIMER’ is so long that IMAX prints are “11 miles of film stock” that “weigh some 600 pounds.”
(https://variety.com/2023/film/news/oppenheimer-r-rating-film-stock-11-miles-long-christopher-nolan-1235630631/…)

item.title: The cast of ‘BARBIE’ with their dolls.

item.title:
‘OPPENHEIMER’ has been rated R for some sexuality, nudity and language.
This marks Christopher Nolan’s first R-rated film since ‘INSOMNIA’ in 2002.

The poster for Apple TV+ series ‘THE CROWDED ROOM’ starring Tom Holland and Amanda Seyfried.
The first three episodes debut on June 9.
